Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a game-tying home run in the 6th inning
Tyrone Taylor scored the go-ahead run in the 9th inning
Edwin Diaz got a save in the 9th inning
Pre-Game Insights: David Peterson had a sharp outing, allowing two earned runs on seven hits and two walks with four strikeouts over seven innings
Post-Match Reflections: David Peterson talked about the resilience of the team
Carlos Mendoza expressed pride in the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pete Alonso hit a home run, moving him ahead of Mike Piazza for third place on the Mets' all-time home run list
The Mets are now 4-3 on a road trip and trail Atlanta by 3 games for the NL's third wild card
